name: svelte-performance
description: ⚡️ svelte-performance: A lightweight, cool performance tracking library for Svelte apps!

scripts.release-patch: npm run format && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "build: new release" && npm version patch && git push origin main && git push origin --tags && gh release create $(git describe --tags) --generate-notes
scripts.release-minor: npm run format && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "build: new release" && npm version minor && git push origin main && git push origin --tags && gh release create $(git describe --tags) --generate-notes
scripts.release-major: npm run format && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "build: new release" && npm version major && git push origin main && git push origin --tags && gh release create $(git describe --tags) --generate-notes

author: Adam014
